definition: sunlight/(Wu dialect) time of the day/moment
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°

sentences.english: Although there are a lot of good time at that time, but also has a period of sadness long memory.
sentences.chinese: 那時雖有大把的好辰光，卻也有一段憂傷漫長的記憶。

sentences.english: On top of the mount, we see beauty rising with the dawn from the east quietly.
sentences.chinese: 在山巔，我們看見美與辰光一同從東方升起。

sentences.english: Morning came slowly with a pale yellow light.
sentences.chinese: 在淡黃色的辰光中早晨姍姍來遲。

sentences.english: CG International Logistics values hi-tech modernization management.
sentences.chinese: 辰光國際貨運重視高科技建設的現代化管理。

definition: Classical Chinese name for planet Venus in the east before dawn
dialectal equivalent of 沒有|没有[mei2 you3]
surname Zhu/abbr. for 天竺[Tian1 zhu2] India (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)/Buddhism (archaic)
Tailai county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
